summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Stable Diffusion latent upscaling pipeline, covering fast unit tests and integration tests for inference correctness, precision handling, scheduler behavior, output consistency, model persistence, CPU offloading, and special cases such as multiple initial images and negative prompts.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the latent upscaling component in Stable Diffusion image generation workflows, enabling safe deployment and consistent performance across different hardware and precision settings.
